S.FORM: == balat == 橫向 siwkay nu balat balat sa , caay kaw nu mabesucay, pitelekay mibelih. tinaku a kamu balaten 使…轉橫；換方向 mabalat 橫 amana balaten ku ni'neng i wawelwel! mabalatay 橫的 mabalat ku ukak nu buting i takulaw nu wacu. mibalat 橫 mabalatay ku culil nu kalang. mibalatay 橫的 nayi' tu ku mibalatay i zazan a kilang. pibalati 橫越 amana pibalati miketun tu zazan! masabalatay a bali pabalaten niza ku luma'. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika wind blowing straight across from the east He put up the crossbeams of the house.

== balat == 橫向 siwkay no balat balat sa , caay kaw no mabesocay, pitelekay mibelih. tinako a kamo balaten 使…轉橫；換方向 mabalat 橫 amana balaten ko ni'neng i wawelwel! mabalatay 橫的 mabalat ko okak no boting i takolaw no waco. mibalat 橫 mabalatay ko colil no kalang. mibalatay 橫的 nayi' to ko mibalatay i zazan a kilang. pibalati 橫越 amana pibalati miketon to zazan! masabalatay a bali pabalaten niza ko loma'. o solit no Holam ato Amilika wind blowing straight across from the east He pot op the crossbeams of the hoose.
